name: The Axeccident
description:
👾 GAME MECHANIC👾

Experience Kratos' Leviathan Axe in all it's 16bit glory! 

👾 THEME 👾

Recreated God of War PS4's Leviathan Axe mechanic.

Throw and  summon your axe to freezes your enemies! 

Reimagined in 16bit console : SNES

👾 SIDE EFFECTS 👾

After freezing enemies and retrieving the axe, the player earns consumable orbs that deal more damage.

👾 FEED BACK👾

Hi! I hope you enjoyed my game! Please leave any comments or feedback you have, I appreciate all of them :D 

Also if you are streaming/recording your gameplay, Please comment a link to your stream or youtube video! I would love to watch your gameplay :)

Have a great weekend! 

Assets Used: 0x72 - https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset tallbeard - https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
